etomica.util

Class ReadParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.util.ReadParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ReadParameters
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class reads input parameters from a file and assigns the values to the fields of an object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Sets the parameterWrapper

      • readParameters

        public void readParameters()
        Reads each line from inputFileName and attempts to match it with a field from parameterWrapper and sets the field to the value from the file. This routine handles boolean, int, long, double, String and arrays of boolean, int long and double.

      • getWrapperClass

        protected java.lang.Class getWrapperClass(java.lang.String line)
